keyMoments.title: Neo Marines Revealed
keyMoments.description: Shuzo leads the Neo Marines in their attack on both Marine forces and Panz Fry, revealing the organization's radical ideology of eliminating all pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Shuzo as the primary antagonist of the arc and introduces the Neo Marines' extremist philosophy.
keyMoments.quote: Pirates must be eliminated on sight. Imprisoning them is ridiculous!

keyMoments.title: Shuzo's Rokushiki Mastery
keyMoments.description: Shuzo demonstrates mastery of multiple Rokushiki techniques including Tekkai, Shigan, Soru, and Geppou, combined with his Longarm Tribe physical advantages.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Shuzo as a formidable opponent with elite Marine training.

keyMoments.title: Shuzo's Defection from the Marines
keyMoments.description: Shuzo reveals to Momonga his reasons for leaving the Marines and joining the Neo Marines under Z's command.
keyMoments.significance: Provides character motivation and explains the ideological divide between Marines and Neo Marines.
keyMoments.quote: I will not stand for imprisoning pirates. They must all be eliminated!

abilities.description: Iron Body technique that hardens the body for defense and attack. Shuzo uses variants including 'Tekkai Three-Section Lariat'.
Finger pistol technique. Shuzo uses variants including 'Shigan Five' and 'Shigan Ten' using all five fingers of one hand.
High-speed movement technique allowing rapid displacement.
Sky-walking technique that allows aerial movement by kicking the air.
Armament Haki that strengthens his Tekkai and Shigan techniques, allowing him to pierce Luffy's rubber body.

relationships.description: Shuzo was formerly a Marine who served alongside Momonga before defecting to the Neo Marines.

evolutionMoments.description: Momonga recognizes Shuzo and is shocked to learn of his defection to the Neo Marines.

relationships.description: Shuzo seeks to eliminate Luffy and all pirates as part of his extremist ideology.

evolutionMoments.description: Shuzo engages Luffy in combat and kicks him into the sea.

reveals.information: Former Marine Commodore who defected to join the Neo Marines under Z
Believes all pirates should be eliminated rather than imprisoned
Master of multiple Rokushiki techniques and Armament Haki

keyMoments.title: Rescued from Marine Custody
keyMoments.description: Panz Fry is successfully rescued by the Straw Hats and reunites with his daughter Lily.
keyMoments.significance: Achieves the episode's initial objective and provides emotional character moment.

keyMoments.title: Connection to Dorry and Brogy
keyMoments.description: Revealed that Panz Fry has been friends with the legendary giants Dorry and Brogy since childhood.
keyMoments.significance: Creates narrative link to earlier story arcs and establishes credibility within giant community.

abilities.description: Specializes in cooking with magma heat, creating dishes like Sea Animal Churrasco and Thousand People Paella.

relationships.description: Panz Fry is Lily's father. They share a close bond with Lily risking her life to rescue him.

evolutionMoments.description: Panz Fry and Lily reunite after the successful rescue operation.

reveals.information: Friends with Dorry and Brogy since childhood
Steals food from Marines and pirates to feed starving people

name.japanese: リリー・エンストマック

keyMoments.title: Reunites with Father
keyMoments.description: Lily emotionally reunites with her father Panz Fry after the Straw Hats successfully rescue him from Marine custody.
keyMoments.significance: Emotional payoff for Lily's journey across the New World to find her father.

abilities.description: Lily changes from her miniature form back to her original giant size, maintaining full giant strength regardless of size.

relationships.description: Lily is Panz Fry's daughter and holds immense regard for his culinary abilities.

evolutionMoments.description: Lily reunites with her father after his rescue.

relationships.description: Lily allies with Luffy and the Straw Hats to rescue her father.

keyMoments.title: Post-Timeskip Appearance
keyMoments.description: Momonga appears for the first time since the two-year timeskip, commanding Marine forces transporting Panz Fry.
keyMoments.significance: Shows continued Marine pursuit of pirates post-timeskip and establishes his role in the Neo Marines conflict.

keyMoments.title: Confronts Shuzo
keyMoments.description: Momonga recognizes his former Marine colleague Shuzo and learns of his defection to the Neo Marines.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals the personal betrayal felt by loyal Marines when colleagues defect to extremist groups.

abilities.description: Armament Haki, standard ability for Marine Vice Admirals.
Observation Haki, standard ability for Marine Vice Admirals.

relationships.description: Momonga and Shuzo served together in the Marines before Shuzo's defection.

evolutionMoments.description: Momonga is shocked to encounter Shuzo as an enemy after his defection to the Neo Marines.

relationships.description: Momonga engages Zoro in combat during the rescue of Panz Fry.

reveals.information: Still serving as Vice Admiral post-timeskip
